attributes.review:
I downloaded this app without knowing what would happen. before I downloaded it everything was going well for me and as a happy republican with beautiful blonde hair and blue eyes... but then it all went wrong.
When I pushed install for the app my phone instantly started glitching I thought maybe it was just my phone glitching even though it never glitches. my phone glitched for about a minute and then it completely shut down when it powered back on somehow Trump was my wallpaper and a disgusting sweaty cheeto smelling gas started coming out of my phone. at this point I’m so confused why is this happening how is this happening but I don’t have time for this so I go ahead and get ready for the plans that I had had before I even tried to install the stupid app I was going out with friends to grab dinner and that’s what I was going to do I wasn’t going to be ashamed of the craziness that was coming out of my phone and happening with my phone so I get ready I leave my house around 7 o’clock I hadn’t been on my phone for the past hour or so and I didn’t want to tell my friends what it happened because I was embarrassed. 
The Cheeto gas is still coming out of my phone and I don’t understand why but I put it away in my purse and hope that nobody notices- I tried covering up the smell with my Bath and Bodyworks vanilla scented body mist and that did the trick until we got to the restaurant... but i wish i never went. when we got to the restaurant things were weird, I don’t know how to explain it but I feel like everybody was staring at me-my friends looked at me looked at each other because we were all confused about what was happening why was everybody staring at me why was everybody looking at us we sat down and we went ahead and ordered I ordered a Caesar salad with slightly diced chicken breast only a half cup because I’m on a diet but anyways-after we all ordered I decided to take out my phone and see if it was any better as soon as I took out my phone everybody’s phones rang... but not mine. everybody seem to answer their phone at the same time and when they did they all looked at me “Why did you install the app” they all said in sink while they looked at me I took my friend who is closest to me phone and it was just whispering
I could hear it say now that you installed the app you’ll never be able to escape it. 
I hang up the phone and ask my friends what just happened they said, “you installed the app didn’t you?”
I said “yes”
they all looked away from me and at that moment I was so confused I didn’t know what to do I was freaking out. The waiter brings out my salad and it is in the perfect exact shape of the cheeto man. at that second when everybody looked over and saw my salad they all ran away.
something’s not right with this app, it’s not worth it.✨😕💞😜🙈🧚🏽‍♂️✨
